A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is a dazzling\, stupid mess...so many pointless subplots filled with leftist poltics\, bad puns\, terrible\, LAZY writing\, and contradictory plot holes.\nBeware if you're a diehard Star Wars fan who cares a lot about the original characters too. I had low expectations going in based on user reviews and was STILL let down. Avoid this if you enjoy good story telling and interesting characters!!
